verses.roman:
kahiha tāṅhāre--'tumi karaha smaraṇa
nitya āsi' āmi tomāra vandiye caraṇa

synonyms: kahiha tāṅhāre—inform her; tumi karaha smaraṇa—please remember; nitya āsi'-coming daily; āmi—I; tomāra—your; vandiye caraṇa—offer respect to the lotus feet.
translation: "Tell her for Me, 'Please remember that I come here every day and offer My respects to your lotus feet.
